definition: To continue or carry on with an activity, process, or action, often implying a sequential progression or ongoing development. It is commonly used to describe the act of resuming or pursuing something that was previously interrupted, halted, or left unfinished.

examples.english: You need to resume the work.

examples.german: Wir können das Gespräch später fortsetzen.
examples.english: We can continue the conversation later.
He wants to pursue his education.

examples.german: Die Serie wird nächste Woche fortgesetzt.
examples.english: The series will be continued next week.
